name: Coal Story
description:
This Little game was made during the Wowie Jam / February 2021 (during 2 days!). It's based on the theme of "Failure is Progress", and tells the little story of a coal who wants to see the sun. Game is based on Plato's "Myth of the Cave". Featuring two different endings, can you find then all? ^__^

A very short game, but we hope you have some fun. As a game made during a Game Jam, we used lots of free assets, which we want to give credit:

Assets:

  • Superpowers Asset Packs (prehistoric-platformer)

  • D'Dialogue System from DoublSB

  • LeanTween

  • Font: x8y12pxTheStrongGamer from @hicchicc
  • WowieJam Assets Pack
